marketplaceWelcome.title: Welcome to Transac
marketplaceWelcome.subtitle: B2B Marketplace for Cameroon
marketplaceWelcome.localMarket: Local market focused on Cameroonian businesses
marketplaceWelcome.footer: Transac - Powering B2B Commerce in Cameroon

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Enter the basic details of your product.

attributes.title: Product Attributes & Images
attributes.description: Add specific details and images of your product.
attributes.materialsPlaceholder: What is your product made of?

preview.title: Product Preview
preview.description: Review how your product will appear to customers before submitting.

about.title: Transac
about.subtitle: Your Gateway to Cameroonian Commerce and Global Products
about.missionStatement: We are transforming commerce in Cameroon by empowering local businesses and small entrepreneurs to reach customers nationwide without the complexity of building their own websites. Our platform also connects Cameroonians with quality international products through our streamlined importation service, taking the hassle out of shipping and making global commerce accessible to all.

onlineStores.title: Ready-Made Online Stores
onlineStores.description: Skip the technical complexity. Set up your professional online store in minutes and start selling across Cameroon without building a website.

importSimple.title: Importation Made Simple
importSimple.description: Want international products? We handle the importation, shipping, and logistics so you can access global goods stress-free.

nationwideDelivery.title: Nationwide Delivery
nationwideDelivery.description: From Douala to Garoua, we connect sellers with buyers across all ten regions of Cameroon through reliable delivery networks.

supportingLocal.title: Supporting Local Businesses
supportingLocal.description: Empowering artisans, farmers, and small business owners to grow beyond their local markets and build sustainable online businesses.

dualMarketplace.title: Dual Marketplace
dualMarketplace.description: Discover authentic Cameroonian products alongside carefully sourced international goods, all on one convenient platform.

trustedSecure.title: Trusted and Secure
trustedSecure.description: Shop with confidence knowing that all transactions are secure and all vendors are verified to maintain quality standards.

forBuyers.title: For Buyers
points: Access to local and international products

callToAction.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
callToAction.description: Whether you're a local entrepreneur ready to scale your business across Cameroon or a customer looking for the best of local and international products, Transac is your trusted partner in commerce.

cartUpdated.title: Cart Updated
cartUpdated.description: The item quantity has been updated.

itemRemoved.title: Item Removed
itemRemoved.description: The item has been removed from your cart.

cartCleared.title: Cart Cleared
cartCleared.description: All items have been removed from your cart.
